schedule: Rome – Villa Cisneros – Sal – Natal – Rio de Janeiro
circumstances: The crew was completing the landing procedure at night while the runway was unlighted. After touchdown, the three engine aircraft collided with five camels sleeping on the runway. The aircraft sustained several damaged and was not repaired. There were no casualties among the occupants of the airplane while the fate of the camels remains unknown.
probable_cause: Collision with five camels after landing.
